entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:28 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -23.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -27.7°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
